item.title: My First Use of Hugo
item.description: I make myself laugh. The title is so “meta”. My first use of hugo is in hugo. :-/ I’ve been searching for a static website generator not a CMS. For the uninitiated, or you don’t want to read the links, a CMS creates the pages a viewer see dynamically when the page is requested (sometime cached), based on looking up data and using templates of sorts to generate pages. A Static Site Generator uses data and templates but pages are generated once during “build time” and the same stuff is displayed until data/files are changed and another “build” happens.
